definition.text: A tutorial topic is an organizational device that helps to keep tutorial step nodes arranged in a logical hierarchy by topics and subtopics.

translations.text: Un tutorial topic es un dispositivo organizativo que ayuda a mantener los nodos de los pasos del tutorial  organizados en una jerarquía lógica por temas y subtemas.

paragraphs.text: Tutorial topics may be nested within other tutorial topics in unlimited levels, and each level may feature multiple tutorial steps.
The configuration of the tutorial topic node is the same as the Tutorial node. Refer to the latter, please.
